text: @realDonaldTrump What's up MR. Law & Order some of your supportive from Tulsa Oklahoma has came down with covid-19 I see Herman Cain is in the hospital covid-19 but you are out here still tweeting about Law & Order but you still refuse to accept your responsibility for causing this pandemic
